WebRTC Calling App

This is a WebRTC-based calling application that allows two people to have a video call.

How to Use

  1. Click on the "Go to Call Page" button below.
  2. On the call page, click "Create Call" to generate a Call ID.
  3. Share the Call ID with the person you want to call.
  4. The other person should enter the Call ID and click "Join Call".
  5. Once connected, you'll be able to see and hear each other.
